nodes.text: Star Wars Monthly 159 is the one hundred fifty-ninth issue of the Marvel Star Wars UK series of comic books.
Starting with this issue, the series's title was changed from The Empire Strikes Back Monthly. The numbering continued from the previous title.
This issue includes one of the few original comic stories in the series, Blind Fury!. It was later reprinted in the Classic Star Wars: Devilworlds series.
This issue reprints the story originally printed in the US as Star Wars 59.
